nodes.text: The Drovan Freighter was a type of freighter. At least one Drovan freighter flew with the Citizens' fleet during the Battle of Exegol against the Sith Eternal forces.

A Drovan Freighter appeared in the 2019 sequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. The vehicle was first identified in the 2020 video "Every Ship in the Star Wars Sequel Trilogy" which was released as part of the Star Wars By the Numbers series on the StarWarsKids.com YouTube channel.

The Drovan freighter also appeared in the Gizmodo article "See How Star Wars' Most Impressive Fleet Was Created in This Exclusive Rise of Skywalker Clip", where it was presented alongside many other starships that were kitbashed together specifically for the Citizen's Fleet.
